name: Korona:Nemesis
description:
Korona:Nemesis is a fast-paced physics-based platform fighter that challenges you to counter your opponents' projectiles on the fly and to adapt to the everchanging interactive environments. Invoke the power of 7 different elements to incinerate your enemies, flush them away, strike them with lightning, death, pain or steel balls, all reactive to each other and the single levels. Switch levers, fire cannons, throw over seesaws and dominate the game.

Play in Online Multiplayer against foes around the world or challenge your friends in local screen-shared multiplayer (coming soon).
